max-height.tooltip: Select the maximum height that the desklet can have.

max-width.tooltip: Select the maximum width that the desklet can have.

refresh-interval.tooltip: Select how frequently the desklet should refresh. Set to 60 for 1 minute, 3600 for 1 hour, 86400 for 1 day.

keep-centered.tooltip: Check this to keep the desklet in the center of the screen.
